head.title: Queens: Two Men Killed In Separate Shootings

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Law Enforcement and Security

hedline.hl1: Queens: Two Men Killed In Separate Shootings
hedline.hl2: Queens: Two Men Killed in Separate Shootings

block.p: Two men were fatally shot about a mile apart in Jamaica early yesterday, the police said. One man, Charles Williamson, 27, of Williamsburg, Va., was shot in the head at 127-05 176th Street about 12:20 a.m., the police said. A half-hour later, the police said, Germaine Persaud, 21, of Queens, was shot in front of his home at 119-46 192nd Street by a man wearing a red bandana.
